meanings.definition: Small, wingless insects that feed on the blood of mammals and birds.
meanings.sent1: The dog scratched itself because of the fleas.
meanings.sent2: The cat's fur was full of fleas.
meanings.sent3: The fleas on the squirrel made it do a funny dance.
meanings.sent4: The idea of fleas in my bed felt like tiny vampires.
meanings.sent5: The fleas jumped from one animal to another, spreading quickly.

meanings.sent1: The old house was known to have fleas in every corner.
meanings.sent2: After camping in the woods, we discovered we were fleas.
meanings.sent3: The idea of being fleas in a giant's beard seemed ridiculous.
meanings.sent4: The thought of fleas taking over the house was terrifying.
meanings.sent5: The room was so dirty, it felt like we were fleas crawling around.

meanings.sent1: The constant buzzing of the fly fleas me during my nap.
meanings.sent2: Stop fleasing me with your endless questions!
meanings.sent3: The way he kept asking the same question fleas me.
meanings.sent4: Her nagging was like a swarm of fleas around my head.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the dripping faucet fleas me more than anything else.
